author: Juli

text:
A bit too slow for my taste. Although that's probably caused by having my own version of slowed Crossing those Hills haha

Also, I have some recommendation for slowed songs:
Everlasting Wanderers (Izlude Theme) from Ragnarok Online
Leader Boss Battle from Digimon World 3
Ancient Groover (Upper Payon Dungeon Theme) from Ragnarok Online
Balamb Garden from Final Fantasy VIII
Beautiful Golden City (Gregminster Theme) from Genso Suikoden I
Earthlight from Einhänder (SiIvagunner created a vaporwave version which is awesome)
Fireflies Heaven from Ragnarok Online
Freedom, Again (Liberated Greenhill theme) from Genso Suikoden II
Magical Ship (Lunar Whale theme) from Final Fantasy IV DS version
Navel of the World (Gaia's Navel theme) from Chrono Cross
Aloha de Chocobo (Chocobo Forest theme) and Ukulele de Chocobo (Chocobo Riding theme) from Final Fantasy IX
Via Purifico from Final Fantasy X

Also try lowering the pitch of Due Fiumi (one of Annalee's song) from Genso Suikoden II to match Two Rivers theme.

author: Commander Shepard

text: Best Final Fantasy is IX
author: Dmitriy Konoko

text:
I have  a weird rating system of the main series Final Fantasies. It goes something like this:
VI is best villain
VIII is best soundtrack.
X is best Combat System
XII is best environments
XV is best Bro simulator
But IX is definitely the best Final Fantasy!
